text: Howard Scott is the founder of Technocracy Incorporated and the Technical Alliance. Howard Scott may also refer to: *Howard E. Scott (born 1946), musician, founding member of the band War *Howard H. Scott (died 2012), sound engineer and producer *Howard Scott (translator), see 1997 and 2009 Governor General's Awards *Howie Scott, a character in the TV series City Lights ==See also== * *Scott Howard (disambiguation)
title: Howard Scott (disambiguation)
